entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening with risk of thunderstorms. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 6 April 2023
